{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Zap Plate |image = [[File:Zap_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Zap Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Electric}} }} ==Description== The '''Zap Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Zap Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Electric Gems]] {{Gem|Electric}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Zap Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Ilex Forest|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Mt Silver|Legendary}} {{LootItem|New Mauville|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Valley Windworks|Epic}} {{LootItem|Old Chateau|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Chargestone Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Plasma Frigate|Epic}} {{LootItem|Dragonspiral Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|P2 Laboratory|Epic}} {{LootItem|Kalos Power Plant|Epic}} {{LootItem|Sea Spirit's Den|Epic}} {{LootItem|Pikachu Valley|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hokulani Observatory|Epic}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Conflict|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
